perturbation.original_text:
4.
Fees for Customizations:
[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Fees for Customizations:
[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of amounts previously paid hereunder only if the increase exceeds 10%.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows Bank of America to terminate the schedule and receive a full refund if the price increases at any time. The modified text restricts this right, allowing termination and refund only if the price increase is greater than 10%. This creates a contradiction regarding the conditions under which Bank of America can terminate the Schedule and receive a refund.

perturbation.original_text:
1.
The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and
the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall deliver to Bank of America the documents described
below for this Customization. The detailed specifications so delivered shall be incorporated herein when approved by Bank of America.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.
The Customizations should generally align with the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and
the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall endeavor to deliver to Bank of America the documents described
below for this Customization. The detailed specifications so delivered shall be considered for incorporation herein upon review by Bank of America.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that customizations 'shall fulfill or exceed' specifications, creating a strict obligation. The modification changes 'shall fulfill or exceed' to 'should generally align,' and 'shall deliver' to 'shall endeavor to deliver,' weakening the obligation and creating uncertainty about the level of compliance required. Also changes 'incorporated herein when approved' to 'considered for incorporation herein upon review'.

perturbation.original_text:
6
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]
perturbation.changed_text:
6
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is subject to change based on resource availability:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]
perturbation.explanation: The original text establishes a specific Delivery and Installation Schedule. The modified text introduces the phrase 'subject to change based on resource availability', making the schedule non-binding and dependent on unspecified resource constraints. This introduces ambiguity and conflicts with the initial implied certainty of the schedule.
